title: Binwalk and firmware of a sat receiver
content:
i'm tried to gather information of firmware and extract the contain with binwalk on kali , when i scanned rom.bin , i have as result many lines 1-> most of lines are LZMA data compressed , but when i extract this data i can't open it. 2-> last line "Mcrypte 2.2 , blofish crypted"

can some help me , what can i do to extract data correctly

here the firmware
http://wikisend.com/download/396604/rom.bin http://wikisend.com/download/194102/ChannelList.bin

thank you

answers_data.content:
It's probably obfuscated:
read more about an obfuscated firmware from WRT120N

I think that you should do hardware analysis in order to know how the firmware is unpacked...
